Articles.Content: Please stop saying Laythadillos. You don't wanna know what i read everytime i see it.

...okaaaaay.

Well how can I say Laythe Armadillo in one word?

On topic on topic: I'll think I'm gonna sketch up the skeletal/muscular structure for the Laythe Armadillo in case anyone is taking this seriously.
Who came up with the idea that there are armadillos on Laythe anyway?
Read back a few pages until you reach the armadillo pictures. Then scroll up a bit more until the start of that conversation.

... OK! Trekkette, Chobit, anyone, news?

EDIT: YES! I DID IT! My tablet finally successfully downloaded one of the wallpapers.

... OK! Trekkette, Chobit, anyone, news?

EDIT: YES! I DID IT! My tablet finally successfully downloaded one of the wallpapers.

Well, I emailed Chobit a copy of the second draft of the first chapter last night. Waiting to hear back from him, though.

Planning to start work on chapter 2 tonight. Or this afternoon if my finger ever stops bleeding...

Well, I emailed Chobit a copy of the second draft of the first chapter last night. Waiting to hear back from him, though.

Planning to start work on chapter 2 tonight. Or this afternoon if my finger ever stops bleeding...

Can't wait to read it. Anyway, I suggest you use a plaster.

Want to read it. Can't wait

Your fingers are bleeding?

Hangnail. It happens. And I can't type with a bandage on my finger.

Bleeding appears to have stopped, so I'll be writing now... or napping. One or the other...

There are no armadillos on Laythe..... yet. I've been pondering some wildlife to sneak into some of the backgrounds or general images. Since I've branched away from original KSP already by making Laythe tropical and habitable, I suppose it isn't too far of a stretch to invent some exotic looking animal and plantlife
I could have found a solution for all the problems. Please look into your inbox chobit.

Gasp! what is this sorcery you speak of?

EDIT: why not Laytheadillos?

Gasp! what is this sorcery you speak of?
Social groups in vBulletin Forums.

Social groups in vBulletin Forums.

Explain to me how this works.

Gasp! what is this sorcery you speak of?

EDIT: why not Laytheadillos?

Probably not Laytheadillos. But Kerbadillos are probable.

Explain to me how this works.
Well this Forum theoretical allows you to open Groups in which the founder acts as moderator. Currently this isn't possible in the KSP forums but i already contacted some Moderators. Lets just see what happens.

Edit: I just received the message that this isn't going to happen at this time

Edited June 7, 2013 by Canopus

Alright, anyway let's brainstorm wildlife for laythe before the mods release the ForumKraken.

How exactly would a Kerbadillo look and what would its predators be? (besides cars and other vehicles)
I would like to see some cool looking aquatic creatures given that the surface of Laythe is mostly Ocean.
I can sketch some sea creatures/monsters. I'm good at that sort of thing. just need to find some paper and pencil.

What has been created?

Will the Kerbaldillos be green like the Kerbals?
I too draw a lot. I currently have no access to a scanner but i'm going to draw some creatures.

I demand bioluminescent fish, mostly because that's what populates the ocean where my Laythecolony is located in my own Laythefic which isn't likely to ever be released. But also because bioluminescence is rather cool.

What has been created?

Will the Kerbaldillos be green like the Kerbals?

Well Kerbadillos have a protective hide/shell so in the environment of PfL Laythe so camouflage isn't necessary for them, I'd also think that there would be some large, colorful bird-like animals like the terror bird or parrots. As for Sea creatures, I've got y'all covered...*maniacal laugh*

@satcharna: they probably would be Bioluminescent because Laythe is further away from the sun and therefore, the oceans darker. I'll factor that into my Sea fauna.
The Laythe ecology is going to be reminiscent of Pandora, from Avatar. That's about all I know.
So will the Kerbals connect to the plants then?
